post.text: President Obama endorses Hillary Clinton for president: "I don't think there's ever been someone so qualified to hold this office." http://hrc.io/AreYouIn

comment.author: Kristen
comment.text: I love this video..your welcome Mr president ! I have been promoting our beautiful Hillary Clinton in the state of Utah..I believe she will continue with the progress we have made against many social and economical issues. I do admire that Bernie got so many young people together, that was pretty impressive. I really think he should be our vice president. He should get out and support Hillary Clinton...The glass ceiling gap is cracking down ..yeah..go Hillary! #IMIN
